page.title: 03NAILSWORTH SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: {Nailsworth}has a wide range of shops but lacks {fashion }and{shoe } shops.It has improved from previous years as there are more shops and better facilities, although more telephone boxes and bus stops are needed.There is a {Dentist, Doctor's {surgery,and a fire and police station There is a{library}in old market with a wide selection of books.Children's activities are frequently held in the Mortimer rooms. People are pleased with the free car parking, but feel the{bus service} could be improved with cheaper fares,cleaner buses,which run more frequently and which also operate more around the small estates.Nailsworth does however lack a {Sports centre}and {Swimming pool. }On the whole people enjoy the facilities of{Nailsworth.
